New Records: Francisco Lindor hit his 29th home run of the season during the game.
Sean Manaea pitched two-hit ball over seven innings, setting a new record for the Mets in this matchup.
Key Match Events: Francisco Lindor hit a solo home run to left center in the 4th inning.
Santiago Marte doubled to center, scoring Jeff Reyes in the 9th inning.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Wrigley Field with a attendance of 16,887 fans.
The Mets clinched a 3-0 series victory over the White Sox.
